label: Firefox
reason:
The browser made by Mozilla, developed with user in mind.
Uses their homemade browser engine: GeckoView, and has a native support for extensions.
Contains telemetry bits that can be disabled in settings

label: Fennec F-Droid
reason: The Firefox you know, but with proprietary bits and telemetry removed

label: DuckDuckGo Privacy Browser
reason:
The browser developed by the team that made the DuckDuckGo search engine.
Offers off-browser features like Email and App tracking protections.

label: Brave Browser
reason: The Brave Browser offers a full set of privacy tools out-of-the-box, like an ad blocker, a VPN, and an integrated TOR Browser

label: Mull
reason: Hardened Firefox browser without any proprietary blobs
